original_text: And he was in the wilderness forty days, being tempted by Satan. And he was with the wild animals, and the angels were ministering to him.
korean_text: 광야에서 사십 일을 계시면서 사탄에게 시험을 받으시며 들짐승과 함께 계시니 천사들이 수종들더라

sentences.original_text: And he was in the wilderness forty days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 광야에 사십 일 동안 있었다

sentences.original_text: And he was with the wild animals
and the angels were ministering to him
